_S.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

SelfBilledInvoice.description: An Invoice document created by the Customer (rather than the Supplier) in a Self Billing relationship.

SelfBilledInvoice.title: Self Billed Invoice. Details
SelfBilledInvoice.description: An Invoice document created by the Customer (rather than the Supplier) in a Self Billing relationship.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Self Billed Invoice. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Self Billed Invoice. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Self Billed Invoice. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Self Billed Invoice. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Self Billed Invoice. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Self Billed Invoice. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Self Billed Invoice. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Self Billed Invoice. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Self Billed Invoice. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

TaxPointDate.title: Self Billed Invoice. Tax Point Date. Date
TaxPointDate.description: The date of the invoice for tax purposes, in accordance with the applicable tax regulation.

InvoiceTypeCode.title: Self Billed Invoice. Invoice Type Code. Code
InvoiceTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of invoice.

Note.title: Self Billed Invoice. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

DocumentCurrencyCode.title: Self Billed Invoice. Document_ Currency Code. Code
DocumentCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the default currency for this document.

TaxCurrencyCode.title: Self Billed Invoice. Tax_ Currency Code. Code
TaxCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency used for tax amounts in the Invoice.

PricingCurrencyCode.title: Self Billed Invoice. Pricing_ Currency Code. Code
PricingCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency used for prices in the Invoice.

PaymentCurrencyCode.title: Self Billed Invoice. Payment_ Currency Code. Code
PaymentCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency used for payment in the Invoice.

PaymentAlternativeCurrencyCode.title: Self Billed Invoice. Payment Alternative_ Currency Code. Code
PaymentAlternativeCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the alternative currency used for payment in the Invoice.

AccountingCostCode.title: Self Billed Invoice. Accounting Cost Code. Code
AccountingCostCode.description: An accounting cost code, applied to the Invoice as a whole.

AccountingCost.title: Self Billed Invoice. Accounting Cost. Text
AccountingCost.description: An accounting cost code, applied to the Invoice as a whole, expressed as text.

LineCountNumeric.title: Self Billed Invoice. Line Count. Numeric
LineCountNumeric.description: The number of Invoice Lines in this document.

InvoicePeriod.title: Self Billed Invoice. Invoice_ Period. Period
InvoicePeriod.description: A period to which the Self Billed Invoice applies.

OrderReference.title: Self Billed Invoice. Order Reference
OrderReference.description: A reference to the Order with which this Invoice is associated.

BillingReference.title: Self Billed Invoice. Billing Reference
BillingReference.description: A reference to a billing document associated with this document.

ContractDocumentReference.title: Self Billed Invoice. Contract_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ContractDocumentReference.description: A reference to a contract associated with this document.

DespatchDocumentReference.title: Self Billed Invoice. Despatch_ Document Reference. Document Reference
DespatchDocumentReference.description: A reference to a Despatch Advice associated with this document.

ReceiptDocumentReference.title: Self Billed Invoice. Receipt_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ReceiptDocumentReference.description: A reference to a Receipt Advice associated with this document.

StatementDocumentReference.title: Self Billed Invoice. Statement_ Document Reference. Document Reference
StatementDocumentReference.description: A reference to a Statement associated with this document.

OriginatorDocumentReference.title: Self Billed Invoice. Originator_ Document Reference. Document Reference
OriginatorDocumentReference.description: A reference to an originator document associated with this document.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Self Billed Invoice. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Self Billed Invoice. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

AccountingCustomerParty.title: Self Billed Invoice. Accounting_ Customer Party. Customer Party

AccountingSupplierParty.title: Self Billed Invoice. Accounting_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

BuyerCustomerParty.title: Self Billed Invoice. Buyer_ Customer Party. Customer Party

SellerSupplierParty.title: Self Billed Invoice. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

PayeeParty.title: Self Billed Invoice. Payee_ Party. Party

TaxRepresentativeParty.title: Self Billed Invoice. Tax Representative_ Party. Party

Delivery.title: Self Billed Invoice. Delivery
Delivery.description: A delivery associated with this document.

DeliveryTerms.title: Self Billed Invoice. Delivery Terms
DeliveryTerms.description: A set of delivery terms associated with this document.

PaymentTerms.title: Self Billed Invoice. Payment Terms
PaymentTerms.description: A set of payment terms associated with this document.

PrepaidPayment.title: Self Billed Invoice. Prepaid_ Payment. Payment

AllowanceCharge.title: Self Billed Invoice. Allowance Charge
AllowanceCharge.description: A discount or charge that applies to a price component.

TaxExchangeRate.title: Self Billed Invoice. Tax_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
TaxExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the tax currency.

PricingExchangeRate.title: Self Billed Invoice. Pricing_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PricingExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the pricing currency.

PaymentExchangeRate.title: Self Billed Invoice. Payment_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PaymentExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the payment currency.

PaymentAlternativeExchangeRate.title: Self Billed Invoice. Payment Alternative_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PaymentAlternativeExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the payment alternative currency.

TaxTotal.title: Self Billed Invoice. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: The total amount of a specific type of tax.

LegalMonetaryTotal.title: Self Billed Invoice. Legal_ Monetary Total. Monetary Total
LegalMonetaryTotal.description: A set of totals associated with this Invoice that are required for the Invoice to be a legal document.

InvoiceLine.title: Self Billed Invoice. Invoice Line
InvoiceLine.description: A line describing an Invoice Item.
